html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-08052012-06-14,  ,  ,  FIN,  AANDC, 
ActNorthwest Territories Act
Federal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Act
SubjectAgreement amending the Tax Collection Agreement - Northwest Territories
PrecisApproval of an Order authorizing the Minister of Finance, on behalf of the Government of Canada, and the Commissioner of the Northwest Territories, on behalf of the government of the Northwest Territories, to enter into an Agreement to amend the TAX COLLECTION AGREEMENT in order to (1) adjust the schedule of territorial corporate income tax payments made by the federal government; (2) make minor changes of an editorial nature or to ensure consistency in wording between all the Agreements.
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Northwest Territories ActFederal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Act
subject: Agreement amending the Tax Collection Agreement - Northwest Territories
precis: Approval of an Order authorizing the Minister of Finance, on behalf of the Government of Canada, and the Commissioner of the Northwest Territories, on behalf of the government of the Northwest Territories, to enter into an Agreement to amend the TAX COLLECTION AGREEMENT in order to (1) adjust the schedule of territorial corporate income tax payments made by the federal government; (2) make minor changes of an editorial nature or to ensure consistency in wording between all the Agreements.
